about_the_game:
The ocean is big, it holds many secrets. The most valuable of these is the Fon Vitae, the source that grants eternal life to anyone who is able to find the way to it. You are just another treasure hunter who dreams of finding this legendary relic.

Features:

  • Manage your own ship, explore the Islands scattered in the ocean.
  • Hire a team to successfully raid the Islands and fight the numerous monsters and other treasure seekers that inhabit these lands.
  • Visit the dungeons in search of parts of the legendary staff that will lead the way to the source of eternal life.
  • Meet bosses with its unique set of abilities that protect untold treasures.
  • Earn your fortune, invest it in your own characteristics, or squander it by gambling in the tavern (and not only).
  • Lead a rampant life of a pirate or focus on your goal - the game will always reward (punish) for your choice.
  • Many new features to come!
